system.availability: Common Craftsmanship replaces a normal arm in all funcitonality. Poor suffers -5 to Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill. Good Craftsmanship gives +10 to Agility Tests for Delicate Manipulation. Best Craftsmanship adds +10 to Strength Tests using the arm, and can also store small items such as pistol clips.
system.cost: Damage works as normal, although inappropriate effects like bleeding just render limb useless
